name: Alien Road Chapter 2
description:
Welcome to chapter 2 of the Alien Road game series. This is a new alien horror game created by me, Sights33r.

Note: Demo version only. The full release will be in the next few weeks.

Story:

After escaping the woods, you crash your car in an abandoned town. Find another way to escape from the aliens hunting you down.

CONTROLS: 

 WASD / ARROWS - MOVE

 W - FORWARD 

 S - BACKWARD 

 A- LEFT 

 D - RIGHT

How To Play: This game has puzzles to solve. Look around the environment for clues on how to solve them. Survive against the aliens by running away from them.
